name: Hell Hound
description:
(Use keyboard to play, click on game area above and press any key to start.)

You're the only one left alive in the military base.  Something has taken over and slain everyone but you.  Keep quiet and try to make it out alive!

This game was originally create for the GIAW(Game in a Week) Jam, with "Everyone is Dead" as the theme. 

Feed back and criticism is welcome and appreciated.
